meanings.definition: The state or quality of being lobed.
meanings.sent1: The lobation of the leaf made it easy to identify.
meanings.sent2: The lobation of the brain helps in its functioning.
meanings.sent3: The lobation of the cake made it look like a flower.
meanings.sent4: The lobation of the mountain gave it a unique shape.
meanings.sent5: The lobation of the puzzle piece made it fit perfectly.

meanings.sent1: She pointed to the lobation on the map.
meanings.sent2: The lobation of the lung helps in breathing.
meanings.sent3: The lobation of the potato made it resemble a heart.
meanings.sent4: The lobation of the building added to its architectural beauty.
meanings.sent5: The lobation of the flower petal was delicate and intricate.
